name: Ext_R5_TestScript_se_ac_as_operator
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.TestScript.setup.action.assert.operator for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents TestScript.setup.action.assert.operator from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/TestScript|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: equals | notEquals | in | notIn | greaterThan | lessThan | empty | notEmpty | contains | notContains | eval | manualEval
element.definition: The operator type defines the conditional behavior of the assert.
element.comment: `TestScript.setup.action.assert.operator` maps to R4B `TestScript.setup.action.assert.operator`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: equals | notEquals | in | notIn | greaterThan | lessThan | empty | notEmpty | contains | notContains | eval | manualEval
element.definition: The operator type defines the conditional behavior of the assert.
element.comment: `TestScript.setup.action.assert.operator` maps to R4B `TestScript.setup.action.assert.operator`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The type of operator to use for assertions.
